backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining publication state, access-controlled publish/unpublish actions, and many data types for users, lessons, assignments, progress, and report cards.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list linking premium pricing and checkout metadata updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing app structure, components, tabs, styling, and premium pricing updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, start behavior, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching for static assets, dynamic caching for API responses, offline fallback, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theme, React Query, authentication flow, publication gating, and conditional rendering for landing, setup, and dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublication: Admin UI for publishing or unpublishing the app, including reason input and status display.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentsTab.t: Displays student assignments and provides teachers with tools to assign, view, submit, and grade assignments.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, authentication controls, and an offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt handling for web and iOS users with deferred install logic and dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/components/LessonPlansTab.t: Lists lesson plans with grade filtering and allows teachers to create new lessons.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows online/offline status notifications using PWA connectivity state.
Displays a multi-step onboarding dialog with role-specific content and tracks completion in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBanner.ts: Shows a premium upsell alert if the user lacks premium access and triggers an upgrade flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a profile creation form that sets name and role, optionally locking role based on sign-in type.
frontend/src/components/ProgressTab.tsx: Shows assignment completion stats and grade averages for the logged-in student using data from queries.
frontend/src/components/ReportCardsTab.t: Manages premium report card access, checkout, subscription cancellation, and report card generation.
frontend/src/components/RoleSignInButton: Renders sign-in buttons for educator/parent or student, storing the selected role before triggering login.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Dialog form for entering Stripe secret key and allowed countries, submitting via useSetStripeConfiguration.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines app name, short name, and tagline constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWA.ts: Detects PWA installation state, online status, and service‑worker update availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data like profiles, roles, subjects, and publication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with utility classes for scroll behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing tabs for lessons, assignments, progress, and report cards with onboarding and premium banner.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that loads a preview from the backend, displays hero and feature sections, and shows role-based sign‑in buttons or a dashboard button if authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Displays a cancellation message for failed payments and provides navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a successful payment confirmation, invalidates premium access cache, and links back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Takedown.tsx: Renders a maintenance-mode takedown screen with optional reason and admin publication controls.
frontend/src/utils/signInType.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing the pre-login sign‑in type in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, maintenance mode behavior, branding updates, and architectural notes.
